lines.text: She raised me for two years... and then sold me?
No she didn't sell you. You were taken from her. Stolen.
I don't care how much you like my parents, or you like my sister, or you like me! But that's my home, I live there! You're just passing through, man!
I have as much right to be here as you!

What you said about forgiveness makes a lot of sense. People do make innocent mistakes that end up hurting someone. But blame doesn't do any good. People have to forgive themselves before hurts can heal.
Maybe you're wondering why I'm writing you this. The reason is, I love you. And I don't want to see you suffer anymore.
